Description October 17, 2024 A new AI-powered cell and gene therapy manufacturing facility is opening its doors in Hamilton, Ont. This will be the largest site in Canada dedicated to producing complex health treatment. As Katherine Ward explains, the goal is to improve access — and cost for patients. - AI-powered cell, gene therapy manufacturer ‘OmniaBio’ opens new facility in Hamilton, Ont.01:49 | October 17, 2024 - Description October 17, 2024 A new AI-powered cell and gene therapy manufacturing facility is opening its doors in Hamilton, Ont. This will be the largest site in Canada dedicated to producing complex health treatment. As Katherine Ward explains, the goal is to improve access — and cost for patients.
